mapper.sql: ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION
mapper.insert: insert into singer (ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, PHOTO) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update:
UPDATE singer
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_NAME = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PHOTO = #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
